snippet: Aaron Ross did not finish Sunday’s victory over Atlanta after sustaining a head injury, and the team announced that he had sustained a concussion.
abstract: New York Giants say cornerback Aaron Ross sustained a concussion in NFC wild-card game against Atlanta Falcons and his status is uncertain for upcoming playoff game.
lead_paragraph: Aaron Ross did not finish Sunday’s victory over Atlanta after sustaining a head injury, and the team announced that he had sustained a concussion.

headline.seo: Aaron Ross Leaves Giants’ Win With Concussion
